actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage of enterostomal therapy services on the same basis as physical therapy services under medicare.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide payment for enterostomal therapy services under the supplementary medical insurance program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage of enterostomal therapy services on the same basis as physical therapy services under medicare.
